languages.text: "Ты что, дурак? Император не занимается такими вещами! Цепи просто привязаны к облакам".
"Are you stupid or what? That's not the kind of thing the Emperor would do! The chains are fastened to clouds, that's all."
languages.original_text: "Ты что, дурак? Император не занимается такими вещами! Цепи просто привязаны к облакам".

traits.locale_text: "Are you stupid or what? That's not the kind of thing the Emperor would do! The chains are tied to clouds, that's all."
"Are you stupid or what? That's not the kind of thing the Emperor would do! The chains are tied to clouds, that's all."
"Are you stupid or what? That's not the kind of thing the Emperor would do! The chains are fastened to clouds, that's all."
"Are you stupid or what? That's not the kind of thing the Emperor would do! The chains are fastened to clouds, that's all."
"Are you stupid or what? That's not the kind of thing the Emperor would do! The chains are fastened to clouds, that's all."
"Are you stupid or what? That's not the kind of thing the Emperor would do! The chains are fastened to clouds, that's all."

languages.text: 「バカじゃないの？皇帝陛下がそんなことするわけないじゃないか！鎖は雲に繋がれてるだけだよ」
languages.original_text: "Are you stupid or what? That's not the kind of thing the Emperor would do! The chains are fastened to clouds, that's all."

traits.locale_text: 「バカじゃないの？皇帝陛下がそんなことするわけないじゃないか！鎖は雲に繋がれてるだけだよ」

languages.text: "Aptal mısın nesin? İmparator hiç öyle şeylerle uğraşır mı? Zincirler bulutlara bağlı."
languages.original_text: "Are you stupid or what? That's not the kind of thing the Emperor would do! The chains are fastened to clouds, that's all."

traits.locale_text: "Aptal mısın nesin? İmparator hiç öyle şeylerle uğraşır mı? Zincirler bulutlara bağlı, işte o kadar."

languages.text: «¿Tú eres tonto? ¡El Emperador no está para esas nimiedades! Las cadenas están unidas a las nubes, nada más».
languages.original_text: "Are you stupid or what? That's not the kind of thing the Emperor would do! The chains are fastened to clouds, that's all."

traits.locale_text: «¿Tú eres tonto? ¡El Emperador no está para esas nimiedades! Las cadenas están unidas a las nubes, nada más».

languages.text: “你是不是白痴？帝皇才不会干这种事情呢！那辆马车是直接拴在云层里面的，这才是真相。”
languages.original_text: "Are you stupid or what? That's not the kind of thing the Emperor would do! The chains are fastened to clouds, that's all."

traits.locale_text: “你是不是白痴？帝皇才不会干这种事情呢！那辆马车是直接拴在云层里面的，这才是真相。”

languages.text: « C'est ridicule, enfin ! Jamais l'Empereur ne ferait une chose pareille ! Les chaînes sont rattachées aux nuages, voilà tout. »
languages.original_text: "Are you stupid or what? That's not the kind of thing the Emperor would do! The chains are fastened to clouds, that's all."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ridicule, enfin ! Jamais l'Empereur ne ferait une chose pareille ! Les chaînes sont rattachées aux nuages, voilà tout. »

languages.text: "Bist du blöd, oder was? Das würde der Imperator niemals machen! Die Ketten sind an den Wolken befestigt, das ist alles."
languages.original_text: "Are you stupid or what? That's not the kind of thing the Emperor would do! The chains are fastened to clouds, that's all."

traits.locale_text: "Bist du blöd, oder was? Das würde der Imperator niemals machen! Die Ketten sind an den Wolken befestigt, das ist alles."
